directions: In large pan cook onion and celery in butter or margarine. Add clam chowder, cream of potato soup, cream of celery soup, clams, and half-and-half, and heat through. NOTE: Half-and-half is best but milk will do.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  New England clam chowder
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of potato soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
title: Quick Clam Chowder
